titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend increased expensing for small businesses.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S644-645)

bill.summary:
1/16/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the increased expensing allowance for small business assets.
